You are setting up Dynamics 365 Finance for a company started in the United States and Canada.You are currently determining policy rules for purchasing. You need to make sure that personnel in the United States and Canada purchase fromseparate catalogs and suppliers.Which of the following actions should you take?
Answers: A. Set up catalog policy rules.
B. Set up purchasing policies at the legal-entity level.
C. Set up category access policy rules.
D. Set up purchasing policies at the organization level.
